story:
What is Trinity?

Trinity is a health resort located at a castle where people are re-brought to optimum health. This castle, surrounded by nature in the middle of Germany, serves as a place providing an insight into the system of holistic health. We are deliberately not using the term "concept" because it is more than that. Our guests shall be able to experience health at its highest level by discovering how their bodies work.

Trinity is the first resort with a holistic system for natural health, both on the national and the international market for wellness and health. The other distinctive feature is the implementation of a science-based nutritional program. 

How it works?

In order for a body to run at its optimum level (positive mind, high levels of energy, long periods of focus etc.), 3 elements must be combined: Body, Mind and Soul - or in other words - mental, psychological and physical health. The three have to function harmoniously together. If one of these elements is missing or neglected, all three of them stop functioning properly. 

If people have health problems, either temporarily or permanently, it usually means that the body’s health system got out of balance, to speak in easy terms. A few people manage to get back to optimum health, but most people don’t. This is why chronic obesity, diabetes, high blood pressure, chronic back pain, headaches, fatigue (to name just a few) are so present these days in modern society.

Not to say that conventional medicine can’t provide somewhat effective, short-term solutions, but it usually focuses mainly on the symptoms or one element or the other, not on the cause and not the combination of all three.

At Trinity we bring these 3 elements together, take the whole system into consideration and strive for sustainability.

Guests can book between 3-21 days and will be taught the system of natural health. 

They will experience an improvement in their health while being at the castle and at the same time, they will receive a step-by-step plan of how they can incorporate this system in their everyday life, so they don’t get sick again and stay healthy for the rest of their life.

Did you know:

We were able to set up basic financing in order to start the project:

  • Purchase of property
  • Construction/extension pool and wellness area
  • Partial refurbishment
  • Equipment and resources.

Additionally, medical insurance companies and tour operators already agreed to work with us and provide customers.

That means the project can be undertaken and will also promise a return.

About Us:

We are a family business. Jens, his sister Elke and his son Mirko.

The idea of „Trinity“ evolved step by step over the last decade. But with the illness of Elke with cancer, “Trinity” became the focus of our work and studies. Elke’s third cancer surgery was the turning point to put the system of natural health into practice. And she is the living proof that “Trinity” works.

Jens Thurm:

Founder Jens Thurm is the living example of this system. At age of nearly 60 he is more mobile and active than most teenagers.

He has studied economics in Berlin but decided in 1995 to pursue his passion for health, spa, fitness and nutrition professionally.

Since then he has studied the system of optimum health intensely. Not only has he applied what he learned to his own way of living but also helped many people reach an optimum level of health. With Trinity he wants to give more people the opportunity to live a life of natural health, full energy and well-being.

His motto: You can only be as active and happy as your health allows you to be.

Mirko Thurm:

Mirko got his Bachelor in Business Economics, specialization in Finance and IT, at the University of Economics and Law in Berlin.

Using his business acumen, he founded the organization “Speedstudents”. Here he teaches Speed Reading techniques as well as learning and memorizing strategies at well-known universities throughout Germany.

He can look back on 15 years of active experience in the areas of fitness, athletics, soccer and swimming. Since 2009 he is also a fitness trainer.

Elke Sticha:

Elke contributes to the company with in-depth knowledge and experience, acquired over several decades, as a laboratory assistant. She has special expertise in analytical methods for inorganic and organic chemistry. In her long-term function as Staff Council President she is well acquainted with the basics of employment law, drafting of employment contracts and employment management.

Why are we so passionate about it?

Trinity is unique and it is our life dream.

Everybody who has ever suffered from some kind of limited health, even for a short period of time, knows that our health is the most precious asset we have. Usually, once it is ruined it hardly recovers completely.

But the human body will always cure itself, if it is given the right parameters. We at Trinity will establish a place where all these parameters are met unconditionally. And that’s what makes people experience real health, energy and happiness.

We want to make as many people as possible as healthy as possible... and we want them to stay healthy forever!

What we need and what you get

In order to make this happen and to start next year in May we reach out for your help!

We need 34,000$ for our marketing campaign:

- Design and layout website until December

- Design and print of image brochure, flyers, menu etc.

Trinity is unique – so our perks are unique!

We created practical perks for the daily life and included the Trinity symbol as a reminder for you that our health is so precious. But that’s not all. We don’t just give reminders. We also give you practical tips, information and guidelines for your health. This input includes irreplaceable tips, information and guidelines for your health. It's a reminder for you that your health is so precious for your whole life. Just do it!

And with the bigger perks you can experience Trinity live! We can offer these perks because with the set-up of the business funds we know that we “take off” next year!

But we need 34,000USD for the professional launch and marketing.

Risks and challenges

If we don’t reach the entire goal it could have an impact on our time table. The opening ceremony in May 2015 could be delayed, and missing the summer period would increase the risk for the successful business operation.

As Jens explained in the video, entrepreneurship isn’t easy in Germany. Especially during the last 2 years, at one point, he stopped counting how often he hit the ground. But no matter how hard you fall, you get up and walk again. Obviously you have to know which direction. And one of our secrets for the business success is the fact that we had a preferred plan “A”, and at the same time always two plans “B” and “C” as options.

We can assure you that we will keep this way of thinking and work for the rest of our life.

The Impact and Help

You learned in the video why we reach out to you. This is also our plan “A”.

And we really hope that you can help to make this unique and irreplaceable project Trinity come true in May 2015!

If you do not have the possibility to help this project financially, we really appreciate if you just spread the word. We really believe that not only more people on this planet should live a healthier live, but everybody has the right to experience optimum health. You know how it feels if you are not healthy. It’s a huge limitation.

So get the word out there. Use the Indiegogo share tools! Help with a comment!

You can make an impact! Thanks for helping!
story_txt:
What is Trinity?
Trinity is a health resort located at a castle where
people are re-brought to optimum health. This castle, surrounded by
nature in the middle of Germany, serves as a place providing an insight into
the system of holistic health. We are deliberately not using the term
"concept" because it is more than that. Our guests shall be able to
experience health at its highest level by discovering how their bodies work.
Trinity is the first resort with a
holistic system for natural health, both on the national and the
international market for wellness and health. The other distinctive feature is
the implementation of a science-based nutritional program. 
How it works?
In order for a body to run at its optimum level
(positive mind, high levels of energy, long periods of focus etc.), 3 elements
must be combined: Body, Mind and Soul - or in other words - mental,
psychological and physical health. The three have to function harmoniously
together. If one of these elements is missing or neglected, all three of them
stop functioning properly. 
If people have health problems, either temporarily or
permanently, it usually means that the body’s health system got out of balance,
to speak in easy terms. A few people manage to get back to optimum health, but
most people don’t. This is why chronic obesity, diabetes, high blood pressure,
chronic back pain, headaches, fatigue (to name just a few) are so present these
days in modern society.
Not to say that conventional medicine can’t provide
somewhat effective, short-term solutions, but it usually focuses mainly on the
symptoms or one element or the other, not on the cause and not
the combination of all three.
At Trinity we bring these 3 elements together, take
the whole system into consideration and strive for sustainability.
Guests can book between 3-21 days and will be taught
the system of natural health. 
They will experience an improvement in their health
while being at the castle and at the same time, they will receive a step-by-step
plan of how they can incorporate this system in their everyday life, so
they don’t get sick again and stay healthy for the rest of their life.
Did you
know:
We were able to set up basic financing in order to
start the project:



Purchase of property
Construction/extension pool and wellness area
Partial refurbishment
Equipment and resources.

Additionally, medical insurance companies and tour
operators already agreed to work with us and provide customers.
That means the project can be undertaken and will also
promise a return.
About Us:
We are a family business. Jens, his sister Elke and
his son Mirko.
The idea of „Trinity“ evolved step by step over the
last decade. But with the illness of Elke with cancer, “Trinity” became the
focus of our work and studies. Elke’s third cancer surgery was the turning
point to put the system of natural health into practice. And she is the living
proof that “Trinity” works.
Jens Thurm:
Founder Jens Thurm is the living example of this
system. At age of nearly 60 he is more mobile and active than most teenagers. 
He has studied economics in Berlin but decided in 1995
to pursue his passion for health, spa, fitness and nutrition professionally. 
Since then he has studied the system of optimum health
intensely. Not only has he applied what he learned to his own way of living but
also helped many people reach an optimum level of health. With Trinity he wants
to give more people the opportunity to live a life of natural health, full
energy and well-being.
His motto: You can only be as active and happy as your
health allows you to be.
Mirko Thurm:
Mirko got his Bachelor in Business Economics, specialization
in Finance and IT, at the University of Economics and Law in Berlin. 
Using his business acumen, he founded the organization
“Speedstudents”. Here he teaches Speed Reading techniques as well as learning
and memorizing strategies at well-known universities throughout Germany. 
He can look back on 15 years of active experience in
the areas of fitness, athletics, soccer and swimming. Since 2009 he is also a
fitness trainer.
Elke Sticha:
Elke contributes to the company with in-depth
knowledge and experience, acquired over several decades, as a laboratory
assistant. She has special expertise in analytical methods for inorganic and
organic chemistry. In her long-term function as Staff Council President she is
well acquainted with the basics of employment law, drafting of employment
contracts and employment management.
Why are we
so passionate about it?
Trinity is unique and it is our life dream.
Everybody who has ever suffered from some kind of
limited health, even for a short period of time, knows that our health is the most precious
asset we have. Usually, once it is
ruined it hardly recovers completely. 
But the human body will always cure itself, if it is
given the right parameters. We at Trinity will establish a place where all
these parameters are met unconditionally. And that’s what makes people experience real health, energy and happiness.
We want to make as many people
as possible as healthy as possible... and we want them to stay healthy
forever!
What we need
and what you get

In order to make this happen and to start next year in
May we reach out for your help!
We need 34,000$ for our marketing campaign: 
- Design and layout website
until December
- Design and print of image brochure, flyers, menu
etc.

is unique – so our perks are unique!
We
created practical perks for the daily life and included the Trinity symbol as a
reminder for you that our health is so precious. But that’s not all. We don’t
just give reminders. We also give you practical tips, information and
guidelines for your health. This input includes irreplaceable tips, information and guidelines for
your health. It's a reminder for you that your health is so precious for your whole life. Just do it!
And
with the bigger perks you can experience Trinity live! We can offer these perks
because with the set-up of the business funds we know that we “take off” next
year!
But
we need 34,000USD for the professional
launch and marketing.
Risks and challenges

If
we don’t reach the entire goal it could have an impact on our time table. The
opening ceremony in May 2015 could be delayed, and missing the summer period
would increase the risk for the successful business operation.
As
Jens explained in the video, entrepreneurship isn’t easy in Germany. Especially

ground. But no matter how hard you fall, you get up and walk again. Obviously

success is the fact that we had a preferred plan “A”, and at the same time

can assure you that we will keep this way of thinking and work for the rest of

story:
Introduction

My name is Dawn Hollister and I am a personal trainer and children's fitness specialist, as well as a certified teacher with 18 years combined experience...and a mom! For 4 years I have been juggling a combination of teaching and trying to launch Bright Futures Fitness, but the last year has been more focused on the latter, including the act of leaving my teaching job for good.
That's where this Indiegogo campaign comes in! In the next year, I have a big push planned to reach more children (and their families) to help them understand the importance of healthy habits and exercise.
The main delivery method for me to train kids is in my after-school group fitness classes. I go right to their school, which is convenient for the parents, and instruct them on their level (thanks to my education and experience), which is definitely good for the kids! I'd like to expand the classes to more locations, but also be able to meet with the kids (and in some cases, their whole family!) in my home gym.
Other services I provide include one-on-one personal training, partner training, and small group workouts for adults and children,

What We Need & What You Get

Here's what I'm looking to do with the $3000 I'm hoping to raise:

  • $500 for children's group fitness equipment (game props, etc)
  • $1000 for home gym equipment (dumbbells, barbells, Dynamax balls, mats)
  • $600 for mirrors for home gym wall
  • $550 for rent to hold fall classes at the schools 
  • $350 for a year-long business card sized ad in the local monthly newspaper
ANY donation at all will get my eternal gratitude AND a public thank you on the Bright Futures Fitness Facebook page and Twitter timeline! 
If I do not reach my full goal, any money that is raised will go directly toward the children's program in the form of equipment for them. If I surpass that $500, funds will be applied to rent for the kids' classes, then home gym equipment, then advertising, in that order. 

Risks & Challenges

I face the same challenges of raising capital and overhead costs that any small business faces, even one without a brick and mortar location like mine. Beyond that, when I first started it was during an economic downturn, and my services are considered a luxury, so many families did not spend that extra money for my classes. I'd like to change that. I'd like families to consider physical exercise and healthy habits training a necessity. 
My plan to overcome these obstacles is simple: education, information, demonstration, and word of mouth. And making it so fun the families can't resist including physical activity in their daily lives! I'm so passionate about helping kids overall, and with their health (and the health of their families) specifically that I truly feel my desire WILL carry me over the finish line. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Can't contribute? It's OK, I understand! But do you know someone else who might be able to contribute? Do you know someone in my area who could benefit from my services for themselves or their children? Help me spread the word! 

  • Share the campaign and my updates on Facebook
  • Share the campaign and my tweets about it on Twitter
  • Visit my website 
  • Tell your friends!

story:
I have come to the conclusion that people are more willing to give money to asinine things like improving a potato salad recipe than actually helping people that psychically need it to survive. I pray I can keep my house and my kids fed and dressed but it's little consolation to a new potato salad recipe. Pathetic. 

Short Summary

My name is Tanya.  I am a mom of 2.  I have been off work since January 14, 2013 due to a chronic pain issue that doctors have been unable to resolve and they have been keeping me heavily medicated to control the pain during this time.  My work provided insurance company denied my disability benefit because if I can sit I am not  considered disabled enough to them.  My doctor is far more concerned with my health and will not sign off on me returning to work in any capacity.  In addition to the constant pain and swelling of my entire left torso, shoulder, neck, arm and hand with any use (typing this hurts) I am on prescription medications which interferes with even my basic thinking and recalling if things.  This is really not good when you have kids.  I have no driver's license because it is unsafe for me to drive and I need to be driven everywhere if I go out at all.  I have missed birthdays, weddings, baby showers, and many other family functions from being in so much pain that I could not even travel there and try to sit at the events.  I have a wonderful husband who has been pulling double duty at home and work because I can barely even cook for my children some days.  He does all the cleaning, arranges all the babysitters and handles all the school stuff  because I cannot.  I have to call on friends and family constantly to take my boys on days where I cannot even get out of bed because my body has seized up so much.  My insurance company is paying for my medications to an extent but we are barely getting by on my husband's pay alone.  I had a really good job, and so far it is still there waiting for me if I can get back to it.  I miss work and my co-workers.  I am a person that actually likes my job and looked forward to going there every day.  I'm not used to feeling so incapacitated and useless to my family and others.

What We Need

We need any financial help we can get.  Since I've been off work we have drained our RRSPs, maxed out our mortgage to pay down some debt, and borrowed from almost every family member. Any money donated will be used to take care of the multitude of issues we currently are facing. 

The Impact

Any help would go towards giving my children more stability in the face of my chronic illness.  I have maybe a few good days a month where I can actually be a mom and go play with them, and make tons of homemade soups and sauces for the freezer as well as cookies (they never make it to the freezer lol). Also, it may actually make it where I don't feel like crying everyday for being a burden to my husband and make me feel like I am contributing in some way to helping our family again.
If you cannot donate or help in any way, please repost this so others that might be able to help if they see this can.  I really appreciate any support.  I have not been through anything so humbling as reaching out for help like this except for watching my mother pass away from breast cancer after a five year battle.  I know, if she was here right now I would not be needing to post this because she would do anything for me or anyone else in need, and she taught me to be the same.

UPDATE - My lawyers have finally gotten my case filed with the Ontario Courts. The bad part is, is that it can still take a year to get through to the mediation stage. Still no help coming any time soon. 
UPDATE - I just sold the rest of my jewelry to buy my kids school supplies.

story:
Click Play on the Video above, to hear the inside scoop.

 

Short Summary

Science Fiction legend and extraordinary thespian Sir Patrick Stewart has moved to the Brooklyn neighborhood of Park Slope-- known for its helicopter parents, kale chips, and double-wide strollers. 

Recently, in an interview with Intelligencer, Stewart said, "I think we are probably the only residents of Park Slope who don't have a stroller... We do eat a lot of kale, but we don't have a stroller."

How sad! When we heard this, we knew what we had to do. After all that he's given us, from brilliant science fiction icons on the screen to Beckett and Shakespeare on the American stage, it's the least we can do.


What We Need & What You Get

We need $1360.93, to purchase a quality baby-stroller for Sir Patrick and his wife. Indiegogo requires a round number, so we'll cover the 93 cents. Plus, lucky break, we qualify for free delivery.

And you get the exhilaration of knowing that you've helped one of your cultural heroes feel at home in his own neighborhood. It's a satisfaction you'll savor every day.


The Impact

In one word: Stroller. 

Another two words: Captain Picard.

Some more words: Community. Belonging. Being a part of something. Kale.


Note: in the unlikely event that Sir Patrick and his wife decline our collective gift of a stroller, all proceeds will be donated to a Brooklyn non-profit organization that provides services for families in need.

Update: Indeed Patrick Stewart turned down the stroller, and in fact tweeted that he did "NOT want a f#$king stroller" to his 1.2 million followers. "But," he continued, "charity is cool." And indeed it is-- all $296 were donated to Good Shepherd Services, a youth development, education and family service agency with more than 80 programs that serve over 26,000 children, youth and families in New york City each year.

story:
Short Summary

I'm a transgendered individual who needs a little help raising funds for medical expenses, (hormone therapy, surgery, hair removal, etc.) that will greatly improve my self image and mental well being.

  • Hi all, my name is Jamie French. I'm a 34 year old transgendered person living in North Texas.
  • I'm seeking financial assistance for a medical procedure.
  • All contributions are greatly appreciated and will be reward with "perks".

What We Need & What You Get

  • I'm trying to raise approximately $3500 within 60 days, every dime of which will go straight to my surgeon.
  • I'm offering "perks" for contributions... the more generous the donation, the more substantial the "perk".
  • My surgeon will take any amount I give him to hold on to until I've reached the total price of the procedure so every donations counts whether or not I reach my goal.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Help spread the word through Twitter, Facebook, or any other networking site.
  • Please feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools in order to help spread the word!
